<script type="text/javascript">    
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
        var voucherData = PH.cookie.get("voucher_notification");                
        if (voucherData){            
            try{
                voucherData = decodeURIComponent(voucherData).replace(/\+/g, ' ');
                voucherData = JSON.parse(voucherData);

                if (voucherData.id && EM.show_voucher_notification_in_page) {
                    EM.AdminNotificationsManager.disableNotificationForShown(voucherData.id);
                }

                var voucherNotificationMsg = voucherData.message,
                    notificationName = voucherData.name;
                
                new EM.Notification({
                    position: 'top right',
                    message : voucherNotificationMsg,
                    icon: 'em em-voucher',
                    ttl: false,
                    className: 'voucher-response-notification',
                    onOpen: function(e){
                        var trackingString = "";
                        if (voucherData.id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.id+'_';
                        }
                        if (voucherData.campaign_id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.campaign_id+'_';
                        }
                        if (notificationName){
                            trackingString += notificationName;
                        }
                        dataLayer.push({event: 'voucher_tooltip_click', ec: "ToolTip", ea: "campanie_"+trackingString, el: "Display campanie_" + trackingString});                        
                    }
                });

                PH.cookie.set('voucher_notification','',-1,'/',window.cookie_domain || EM.cookie_domain);
            }catch(e){
            }
        }        
    })
</script>

r=0,a=function(){};return{s:a,n:function(){return r>=e.length?{done:!0}:{done:!1,value:e[r++]}},e:function(e){throw e},f:a}}throw new TypeError("Invalid attempt to iterate non-iterable instance.\nIn order to be iterable, non-array objects must have a [Symbol.iterator]() method.")}var i,o=!0,u=!1;return{s:function(){n=e[Symbol.iterator]()},n:function(){var e=n.next();return o=e.done,e},e:function(e){u=!0,i=e},f:function(){try{o||null==n.return||n.return()}finally{if(u)throw i}}}}function _unsupportedIterableToArray(e,t){if(e){if("string"==typeof e)return _arrayLikeToArray(e,t);var n=Object.prototype.toString.call(e).slice(8,-1);return"Object"===n&&e.constructor&&(n=e.constructor.name),"Map"===n||"Set"===n?Array.from(e):"Arguments"===n||/^(?:Ui|I)nt(?:8|16|32)(?:Clamped)?Array$/.test(n)?_arrayLikeToArray(e,t):void 0}}function _arrayLikeToArray(e,t){(null==t||t>e.length)&&(t=e.length);for(var n=0,r=new Array(t);n<t;n++)r[n]=e[n];return r}!function(window,EM,Experiments){function sanitizedRules(rules){if(null==rules)return[];var sanitized=[],_iterator=_createForOfIteratorHelper(rules),_step;try{for(_iterator.s();!(_step=_iterator.n()).done;){var rule=_step.value;if(Array.isArray(rule))sanitized.push(sanitizedRules(rule));else{var actual=void 0;try{actual=eval(rule.actual),actual=null!==actual?actual:"null"}catch(e){actual="null"}sanitized.push({type:rule.type,expected:rule.expected,actual:actual})}}}catch(e){_iterator.e(e)}finally{_iterator.f()}return sanitized}try{if(window.Cookie=_experiment__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.a.DEFAULT_COOKIE,_experiment__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.a.logOtherAllocations(window.dataLayer),0!==Experiments.data.length){for(var experiments=[],now=new Date,i=0;i<Experiments.data.length;++i){var experimentData=Experiments.data[i];if(!(now<new Date(experimentData.dateStart)||now>new Date(experimentData.dateEnd)))try{experiments.push(new _experiment__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.a("".concat(_experiment__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.a.PREFIX).concat(experimentData.id),{curtain:experimentData.curtain,exclusive:experimentData.exclusive,traffic:experimentData.traffic,dataLayer:window.dataLayer},sanitizedRules(experimentData.rules),experimentData.variations.map((function(e){return{name:"",callback:e.callback}})),experimentData.exclusions,experimentData))}catch(e){}}new _runner__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.a(experiments)}}catch(e){_runner__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.a.removeCurtain()}}(window,window.EM||{},window.EXPERIMENTS||{data:[]})}]);</script>
        <script>
    var EM = EM || {};
    EM.translations = EM.translations || {};EM.translations["Jan."] = "Ian.";EM.translations["Feb."] = "Feb.";EM.translations["Mar."] = "Mar.";EM.translations["Apr."] = "Apr.";EM.translations["May."] = "Mai";EM.translations["Jun."] = "Iun.";EM.translations["Jul."] = "Iul.";EM.translations["Aug."] = "Aug.";EM.translations["Sept."] = "Sept.";EM.translations["Oct."] = "Oct.";EM.translations["Nov."] = "Nov.";EM.translations["Dec."] = "Dec.";</script>
<script>
    (function() {
        dataLayer.push({
            unique_token: String(Date.now()) + '' + (Math.floor(Math.random()*90000) + 10000)
        });
    })();
</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    window.EM = window.EM || {};
    window.EM.gtmUpdateTracking = function(data) {
        try {
            var result = {
                ecommerce: {
                    impressions: getImpressions(data.items),
                    search_category_recommendations: getVisualFilterTracking()
                },
                filter_click: data.trackedFilters
            };

            if (data.isDynamicallyLoaded) {
                result.event = 'listing_refresh';
                result.unique_token = String(Date.now()) + '' + (Math.floor(Math.random()*90000) + 10000);
            }

            if (data.category) {
                result.category_id = data.category.id;
                result.depId = data.category.department.id;
                result.listingCategory = data.category.trail;

                if (data.category.subdepartment) {
                    result.sdId = data.category.subdepartment.id;
                }
                if (data.category.department) {
                    result.depId = data.category.department.id;
                }
            } else if (data.items) {
                // finding department and subdepartment which have the most products on page
                // priority is given to subdepartment and the department it belongs to
                var frequency = {},
                    max = 0,
                    maxSubdepId,
                    maxDepId;
                data.items.forEach(function(item) {
                    var depId = item.category.department.id;
                    var subdepId = item.category.subdepartment.id;

                    frequency[subdepId] = frequency[subdepId] || 0;
                    frequency[subdepId]++;

                    if (frequency[subdepId] > max) {
                        max = frequency[subdepId];
                        maxSubdepId = subdepId;
                        maxDepId = depId;
                    }
                });

                result.sdId = maxSubdepId;
                result.depId = maxDepId;
            }

            if (data.conditions.filters.page_type === 'search' && data.searchQuery) {
                result['searched term'] = data.searchQuery;
            }

            var filters = [];
            var brandVendorWohoo = {
                brand: [],
                vendor: []
            };
            var i, l, filterId;
            for (var key in data.conditions.filters) {
                if (data.conditions.filters.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
                    if (
                        ['query', 'category', 'shop_id', 'page_type', 'department', 'subdepartment'].indexOf(key) !== -1
                        || /^tree_ref_\d+$/i.test(key)
                    ) {
                        continue;
                    } else if (key === 'custom_filter') {
                        for (filterId in data.conditions.filters[key]) {
                            if (data.conditions.filters[key].hasOwnProperty(filterId)) {
                                for (i = 0, l = data.conditions.filters[key][filterId].length; i < l; i++) {
                                    var optionId = data.conditions.filters[key][filterId][i];
                                    filters.push(data.filters[filterId].name + '_' + data.filters[filterId].items[optionId].name);
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    } else {
                        if (key === 'brand' || key === 'vendor') {
                            if (key === 'brand') {
                                result.brand_id = data.conditions.filters[key];
                            }

                            // getting filter values for the special filters
                            var specialFilterData;
                            for (filterId in data.filters) {
                                if (data.filters.hasOwnProperty(filterId)) {
                                    if (data.filters[filterId].type === key) {
                                        specialFilterData = data.filters[filterId];
                                        break;
                                    }
                                }
                            }

                            if (specialFilterData) {
                                for (i = 0, l = data.conditions.filters[key].length; i < l; i++) {
                                    brandVendorWohoo[key].push(specialFilterData.items[data.conditions.filters[key][i]].name);
                                }
                            }
                        } else {
                            filters.push(key[0].toUpperCase() + key.slice(1) + '_' + data.conditions.filters[key]);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            result.pageType = EM.listingGlobals.pageType;
            result.pageType_google = (EM.listingGlobals.pageType === 'search' ? 'searchresults' : 'category');
            if (EM.listingGlobals.category && EM.listingGlobals.pageType === 'search') {
                result.search_category = EM.listingGlobals.category.name;
            }
            result.urlDivisions = {
                brand: brandVendorWohoo.brand,
                vendor: brandVendorWohoo.vendor,
                cleanurl: EM.listingGlobals.baseUrl.path,
                pr_no: EM.listingGlobals.resultsPerPage,
                pagination: EM.listingGlobals.currentPage,
                sort: EM.listingGlobals.sortOption ? (EM.listingGlobals.sortOption.id + ' ' + EM.listingGlobals.sortOption.direction) : '',
                filter: filters,
                shortTitle: EM.listingGlobals.shortTitle
            };

            if (data.isDynamicallyLoaded && window.google_tag_manager) {
                window.google_tag_manager["GTM-TKS335"].dataLayer.reset();
            }

            dataLayer.push(result);

            // If we don't have results and it's search
            if (!data.items.length && data.conditions.filters.page_type === 'search' && data.searchQuery) {
                dataLayer.push({event: 'gaEvent', ec: 'Search Results', ea: 'No Results', el: data.searchQuery});
            }
        } catch(ex) {
            dataLayer.push({event: 'gaEvent', ec: 'navigation_error', ea: 'dataLayer_tracking_error', el: ex});
        }
    };

    function getImpressions(items) {
        var impressions = [];

        for (var i = 0, l = items.length; i < l; i++) {
            impressions.push({
                id: items[i].offer.id,
                doc_id: items[i].id,
                category: items[i].category.trail,
                list: items[i].category.name,
                position: (i + 1),
                vendor_name: items[i].offer.vendor.name.default,
                product_name: items[i].name,
                status: items[i].offer.availability.text,
                scm_super_category: items[i].scm_super_category && items[i].scm_super_category.name,
                scm_super_category_id: items[i].scm_super_category && items[i].scm_super_category.id,
                offer_marking: items[i].offer.unified_badges ? items[i].offer.unified_badges.map(function(badge) { return badge.type; }) : null,
                category_id: items[i].category.id,
                subdepartment_id: items[i].category.subdepartment.id,
                department_id: items[i].category.department.id
            });
        }

        return impressions;
    }

    function getVisualFilterTracking() {
        let visualFiltersList = EM.listingGlobals.recommended_categories;
        if (!visualFiltersList) {
            return null;
        }

        return visualFiltersList.map(function(visualFilter, index) {
            return {
                position: index + 1,
                category_name: visualFilter.name,
                results_no: visualFilter.count,
                category_id: visualFilter.id
            };
        });
    }


    EM.listingGlobals = EM.listingGlobals || {};EM.listingGlobals.resultsPerPage = 60;EM.listingGlobals.currentPage = 1;EM.listingGlobals.sortOption = {
                    id: "score",
                    direction: "desc"
                };EM.listingGlobals.shortTitle = "Rezultate cautare";
    EM.listingGlobals.pageType = "search";
    EM.listingGlobals.baseUrl = {"path":"\/search\/Nespresso+Mini","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"};
    EM.listingGlobals.conditions = {"filters":{"shop_id":1,"page_type":"search","query":"nespresso mini"}};
    EM.listingGlobals.category = null;
    EM.listingGlobals.phrase = {"initial":{"string":"Nespresso Mini","results_count":32,"url":{"path":"\/search\/Nespresso+Mini","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"},"is_main":true,"words":[{"string":"Nespresso","is_excluded":false,"url":{"path":"\/search\/Nespresso","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"},"remove_url":{"path":"\/search\/Mini","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"}},{"string":"Mini","is_excluded":false,"url":{"path":"\/search\/Mini","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"},"remove_url":{"path":"\/search\/Nespresso","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"}}]},"special":[]};
    EM.listingGlobals.section = "search";
    EM.listingGlobals.recommended_categories = ""

<script>
(function() {
    if (!EM.is_logged_in) return;
    var a = document.querySelector('#my_account');
    a.setAttribute('href', '/user/myaccount?ref=ua_personal_data');
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        var i = a.querySelector('.navbar-icon');
        i.replaceWith(PH.node(EM.TMPL.exec('@Components/NavbarDropdowns/avatar.html.twig', {
            user_avatar: EM.user_avatar,
            has_club_membership: EM.user_data && EM.user_data.has_club_membership
        })));
    });
})();
</script>

    </section><script>
     (function(list){
         if (!list) return;
         var json = {
             "@context": "https://schema.org",
             "@type": "FAQPage",
             "mainEntity": [].reduce.call(list.querySelectorAll("li"), function(a, item){
                 var name = item.querySelector("h3");
                 var text = item.querySelector("p");
                 if (name && text) {
                     a.push({
                         "@type": "Question",
                         "name": name.textContent.replace(/\s+/g, " "),
                         "acceptedAnswer": {
                             "@type": "Answer",
                             "text": text.textContent.replace(/\s+/g, " ")
                         }
                     });
                 }
                 return a;
             }, [])
         };
         var script = document.createElement("script");
         script.setAttribute("type", "application/ld+json");
         script.textContent = JSON.stringify(json);
         document.head.appendChild(script);
     })(document.querySelector("#seo-f-a-q"));
    </script><section class="page-section js-recommendation-carousel js-widget-not-loaded" id="navigation-history" data-scenario="navigation-history" data-source-product-id="" data-scenario-index="1">

                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="https://anpc.ro/?ref=footer_3_5" class="footer-link" title="ANPC">ANPC</a></li>
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="https://anpc.ro/categorie/1271/sal?ref=footer_3_6" class="footer-link" title="ANPC - SAL">ANPC - SAL</a></li>
                                                                                </ul>
                    </div>
                                                                                <div class="col-sm-3 js-footer-group">
                        <a href="#footer_services-4" class="ph-widget ph-collapse-one footer-head js-footer-head collapse-disabled" data-phino="CollapseOne" data-ph-target="#footer_services-4" tabindex="0">eMAG.ro</a>
                        <ul id="footer_services-4" class="footer-body collapse" style="overflow-y: hidden;">
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="https://marketplace-leads.emag.ro?utm_source=eMAG.ro&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=footer?ref=footer_4_1" class="footer-link" title="Vreau sa vand pe eMAG">Vreau sa vand pe eMAG</a></li>

                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="/info/politica-de-utilizare-cookie-uri?ref=footer_4_4" class="footer-link" title="Politica de utilizare Cookie-uri">Politica de utilizare Cookie-uri</a></li>
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/main/index.cfm?event=main.home2.show&amp;lng=RO?ref=footer_4_5" class="footer-link" title="Solutionarea Online a litigiilor">Solutionarea Online a litigiilor</a></li>

                    </div>

    </div>
</div>
